H0.text: what political party did andrew johnson belong to. National Union Party

H1.text: what political party did andrew johnson belong to. Whig Party

H2.text: what political party did andrew johnson belong to. American Party

H3.text: what political party did andrew johnson belong to. Democratic Party

A4.text: Johnson ran with Lincoln on the National Union Party ticket in the 1864 presidential election.

A5.text: Johnson became a strong advocate for the Democratic Party and built a powerful political machine in Greene County.

A6.text: Johnson stayed independent of both parties after 1865.
